short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An offline tool to remove the background of an image using WebGPU, transformers and RMBG model

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension precisely identifies and eliminates image backgrounds using the advanced "RMBG V1.4" machine learning model developed by BRIA AI. Leveraging WebGPU technology, it achieves rapid background removal within a matter of seconds, all while functioning offline.

Key Features:
1. Swift and precise background removal.
2. Complete offline functionality.
3. Enhanced performance through WebGPU usage.

Use Cases:
This tool serves various purposes, including:
- Removing unwanted background sections from images.
- Generating images with transparent backgrounds, facilitating overlaying on different backgrounds effortlessly.
